thruputs

Textual inputs

Textual inputs.

Arguments

id

A character string specifying the id of the textual input, defaults to NULL.

value

A character string or a value coerced to a character string specifying the default value of the textual input.

placeholder

A character string specifying placeholder text for the input, defaults to NULL, in which case there is no placeholder text.

size

One of "small" or "large" specifying the size transformation of the input, defaults to NULL, in which case the inputâ€™s size is unchanged.

readonly

If TRUE, the textual input is read-only preventing modification of the value, defaults FALSE.

help

A character string specifying the help text of the textual input, defaults to NULL, in which case no help text is added.

...

Additional named arguments passed as HTML attributes to the parent element.
